title: We've Got Answers
subtitle: Everything you need to know about going solar and renewable energy

items.question: How do solar panels work in Ireland?
items.answer: Solar panels use photovoltaic cells to convert daylight (not just direct sunshine!) into electricity for your home. Any excess energy can be stored in a battery, used to heat water, charge your EV, or sold back to the grid. Ireland gets plenty of daylight to make solar worthwhile.

items.question: How much will I save on my electricity bills?
items.answer: Most homeowners see a significant reduction in their electricity bills. Our systems are designed for long-term performance and can pay for themselves within a few years. After that, you're generating free electricity for decades.

items.question: What SEAI grants are available?
items.answer: The SEAI offers up to €1,800 for residential solar PV systems. We'll guide you through the entire grant process and help you claim every cent — we handle all the paperwork so you don't have to.

items.question: What is an air-to-water heat pump?
items.answer: An air-to-water heat pump is a direct replacement for your existing gas or oil boiler. It runs on electricity and is tested at over 400% efficiency — meaning for every €1 you spend on electricity, you receive €4 worth of heat. It heats your radiators, underfloor heating, and provides hot water 24/7.

items.question: Do you handle the full installation?
items.answer: Yes! We handle everything from paperwork and SEAI grants to installation and setup. Our expert team delivers a smooth, tidy, and professional installation on time and on budget. We never sub-contract — all work is done by our own qualified team.

items.question: What warranty do you offer?
items.answer: We stand over our work with a lifetime workmanship guarantee for your total peace of mind, along with manufacturer warranties on all equipment. Our systems are built to last and designed for long-term performance.

items.question: How long does installation take?
items.answer: Most home solar installations are completed in just 1-2 days. Our team arrives on time, keeps everything clean and tidy, and gets you up and running quickly.

items.question: What areas do you cover?
items.answer: We're based in Deansgrange Business Park, Blackrock, Dublin and cover Dublin, Wicklow, Kildare, Meath, and beyond. Get in touch wherever you are — we'd love to help!
